45.eng-name: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an
45.ara-name: كتاب ثواب القرآن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin 'Abdullah:"During the Mawqif (hajj season), the Prophet (ﷺ) would present himself and say: 'Which man will bring me to his people? For indeed the Quraish have prevented me from conveying the Speech of my Lord

chapter.eng-name: 'Which Man Will Bring Me To His People To Convey The Speech Of My Lord'
